post.content:
As the last test in order to get admitted in Codeworks, the full stack JavaScript bootcamp I did back in 2018, I had one week to create and deliver a blackjack game.

I had some much fun doing it and though I might link it here, just in case someone wants to play :)

This is the GitHub repo and the game can be played here.

frontmatter.title: Creating a Blackjack game
frontmatter.spoiler: A memento of my first ever JavaScript project circa February 2018.

frontmatter.title: 5 cool JS tricks to impress your teammates
frontmatter.spoiler: Some web-dev wisdom, not just limited to JS!
